alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, northwestern Jefferson, eastern Leon and southern Thomas Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Thomasville to near Woodville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Alma, Lake Bradford, Cody, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Everett, Walker Ford Community Center and Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
